ClassDesc: Interface for managing the items in a menu. By default, every Activity supports an options menu of actions or options. You can add items to this menu and handle clicks on your additions. Adding menu items is typically accomplished by inflating an XML file into the @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenu_E@ by using a @B_android#view#MenuInflater_E@. Different menu types support different features:
